sentences.english: A lot of people also sit outdoors, enjoying the cool, breezy nighttime air.
sentences.chinese: 还有好多人坐在室外，享受凉风习习的夜晚。

sentences.english: Heater breeze, the sun, the air thick with incense of glutinous rice.
sentences.chinese: 暖风习习，艳阳高照，空气中弥漫着浓浓的糯米香。
今日凉风习习，非常舒适。

sentences.english: Now he felt the cool breeze that was blowing in this part of the Maze and it was refreshing.
sentences.chinese: 这时，从迷宫中吹来习习的凉风，使人感到神清气爽。

sentences.english: However, the desert breeze couldn't wipe away my feeling of being cheated.
sentences.chinese: 然而，戈壁的习习微风并不能扫去我被欺骗后感受。

sentences.english: For most of the country, the crisp cool air of autumn is upon us.
sentences.chinese: 在很多国家，凉风习习的秋天已经来到了我们身边。

sentences.english: In the autumn breeze, we end this pleasant trip.
sentences.chinese: 在习习的秋风中我们结束了这次愉快的旅行。

sentences.english: The blustery winds of spring had dropped to a gentle breeze.
sentences.chinese: 呼啸的春风已经减弱，成了习习的微风。

sentences.english: On breezy days we used to enjoy flying kites on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 在凉风习习的天，我们用来享受飞行的风筝在沙滩上。

sentences.english: In fact, the air felt breezy and cool, but warm enough.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，天朗气清，凉风习习，可是并不冷。

sentences.english: Jute detail lines midsole for a breezy finish.
sentences.chinese: 一个凉风习习的完成为底的黄麻详细线。

sentences.english: My words, quietly lying on the rocks, away against Zhushan, dress blowing.
sentences.chinese: 我的文字，静静地躺在岩石边，遥对珠山，衣裙习习。

sentences.english: Its green boughs in the breezy sky.
sentences.chinese: 它翠绿的枝干伸向微风习习的天空。

definition: sea breeze/sea wind (i.e. from the sea)
soughing/whistling or rushing sound (of the wind in trees, the sea etc)
lit. sth hits one in the face/directly in one's face/sth assaults the senses/blatant (advertising)/eye-catching/(a smell) assaults the nostrils
(of a breeze) to make (hair, leaves, clothing etc) sway gently/to ruffle
fine rain/drizzle/poem by Tang poet Li Shangyin 李商隱|李商隐
